Scriptal.Name: Check StrCode32
Scriptal.Description:
Checks to see if a string or a number matches a StrCode32 number. Handy for checking event arguments. This is the go-to method of checking if a raw string is involved in an event, like a route name or a trap name.
- Check Tex's notes on messages in InfLookup.lua for more details: https://github.com/TinManTex/InfiniteHeaven/blob/master/tpp/gamedir-ih/GameDir/mod/modules/InfLookup.lua Signatures that contain an argument with a argType="str32" are StrCode32 numbers. Use this to check against them.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempStrCode32Val = |[1|STRING,NUMBER]| if type(tempStrCode32Val) == "string" then tempStrCode32Val = StrCode32(tempStrCode32Val) end return tempStrCode32Val == |[2|NUMBER]|

Choice.Name: Game String
Choice.Description: The String or Number to be compared against.

Choice.Name: StrCode32
Choice.Description: The StrCode32 to compare against the string/number. The precondition is fulfilled if they match.
